the NAEB, to my knowledge, has not received any Divine Sanction.
In fact.
c. The NAEB appears to feel that there is no conflict between the
interests of its radio and its TV members. This is nonsense. Each
new ETV station diminishes the importance and influence of every
educational radio station within its range. Naturally this is re¬
sented. By the same token each dollar spent by a community on
educational radio diminishes the potential income of an LTV station
This conflict Is of long standing and will become more, rather
than less, bitter in the future.
d. The NAEB vote structure is such that radio can easily outvote
television whenever a conflict arises.
e. The NAEB is geographically loaded in favor of the Middle West.
This is also the area of greatest activity in radio. This and
d (above) mean that Mid-West radio operators can always dominate
an NAEB vote. When c (above) Is considered it means that LTV
has no real chance to promote its interests in the NAEB except
by sufferance. It has no right to elect an officer or board
member, or pass on matters“aITecting ETV. What has been done by
the NAEB to help ETV has been done through the charity of the
radio members. In my opinion this is a hell of “a way to run a
railroad.
f. Ever since I have known NAEB it has insisted on playing politics
with foundations and others to the detriment of aomplementary
organizations. One would sometimes suspect from NAEB actions
that the chief enemy of the United States wa3 neither imperial
communism nor apathetic ignorance but rsfiier the JCET. This is
both childish and dangerous.
g. NAEB action tends to be slow, cumbersome and frequently In¬
effective. Its personnel bear some responsibility for this but
its organizational structure is chiefly to blame.
h. A good public relations program for the numerous (and amorphous)
functions listed in a (above) is impossible to execute. Hence
the PR side of NAEB has been ridiculous.
i. NAEB does not provide any real help toward the activation of
new ETV stations.
j. NAEB does not provide any real help for functioning ETV stations.
k. There are a lot more things wrong with NAEB but this is a start
(although a very small start at that).
